Paul

After encounter with other life form his DNA started to change, atoms of his body are changing.

He is mentor of the crew and they try to prevent global catastrophe.

Erik & Anit

They are able to freeze the moment and create static shadow of reality.

Their love goes beyond the frontiers of time.

Igor

He developed the ability to sense constructs of human imagination.

He was arrested for something he never did.

Zelo

As family friend he tries to help during this mission.

His dream is to acquire some superpowers.

Frame

Psychotic killer. He kills his victims with readioactive frame that creates picture of the exact moment when his victim dies.

He claims that what is does is art of the purest form.

Cochra

Man who was born with severe mutation that caused his bodz to be transparent like the glass frog.

He wants his DNS to be spread so he gives women sedatives in their drink and does the most terrible thing.

Selfieman

Killer, who hates narcissism of internet era. He claims that modern technologies are feeding the worst places of human soul.

He enjoys to kill "influencers" and popular personalities of this subculture.

Leguna

All four limbs of this female are legs. They are extremely strong and able to stretch, bend and choke.

She is beautiful and seduced a lot of men.

Violonchela

This girl was born deaf and with not developed Siamese twin. She always loved the vibration of music.

One day she agreed to undergo very drastic modification, where violonchello became organic part of her body.

Rainsaw

He created hallucinogen drug that makes people see animated world or cause them relive some parts of life where they felt happy.

During intoxication they are almost unable to live real life.

Necridas

Secret syndicate of scientists tried to clone some of historical figures. They created viking-conqueror, whose head was connected to cloned body of bear.

He is extremely violent and plans to change the world.
